projects.title: Travis-GPT
projects.description: A RAG supplemented LLM that answers questions about my CV and experience. Leverages OPENAI's api and deployed using EC2 and Route53.

projects.title: Anime Recommender
projects.description: An app where users can review anime, receive recommendations based on previous reviews, and edit their watchlist.

projects.title: Chinese Radical Review
projects.description: A mobile app designed to help Chinese language students learn radicals (building blocks of chinese characters) using spaced repetition

projects.title: Ecommerce Purchase Predictor
projects.description: Uses CSV data to train a model that classifies users into two groups; users that will make a purchase and users that won't make a purchase.

projects.title: Detective Conan Web Scraper
projects.description: A web scraper and data manipulation py script

projects.title: RESTful Movie Database API
projects.description: A rest api build using Django REST framework

projects.title: Investigating Decline in Yammer Users
projects.description: Using focused SQL queries to gather relevant data and determine the source of user decline.

projects.title: Exploring data about drug use
projects.description: Using SQL to answer questions like 'Do graduate degree holders use more caffeine than less educated people?'

projects.title: Whisky Review Sentiment Classifier
projects.description: Using NLTK libraries to classify whisky reviews as positive or negative based on customer sentiment.

projects.title: C++ Customer Database
projects.description: Linked-list implementation of a database that holds customer info. Uses recursion, pointers, operator overloading, debug mode, copy constructors, and makefiles. User can add, print, modify, and delete records within the database. The user can also reverse the list of records. The records within the list are written to a file upon exiting the application, and read from a file upon starting an application.

projects.title: OOP Video Series w/ C++
projects.description: An educational video series I made that provides examples of S.O.L.I.D. object oriented programming using C++

projects.title: Personal Investment Tracking App!
projects.description: A web app to track my stock trades over time. Includes auth.

projects.title: 25+5 Timer
projects.description: A timer with customizable parameters for work time and break time. Implemented in 3 ways: as a single page stateful REACT app, a stateful app divided into parent & child classes, and an app made of functional components using hooks.

projects.title: AWS S3 Hosted Blogsite
projects.description: My blog page that I created and hosted on AWS S3 and Cloudfront
